values:
All previous posts that say anything important have been made friends-only.

All posts from now on will be friends-only.

This is to keep out people like you.

Yes.  I am talking to you.  No, I will not add you to my friends list.  Please go away.

http://www.livejournal.com/community/yourdesire_/247937.html

Look, I claimed you.

Yes, you.

All of you.

All of that you that comment, anyway.

Most important thing. Go here, please. Unless you don't read Harry Potter, in which case, you are a loser. F I R S T First Best Friends: Victoria First Crush: Steven, second grade First Album/CD: Britney Spears, I believe -_- First Piercing/Tattoo: Right ear. Followed one minute later by the left ear. First True Love: Ward. Please go away. First Enemy: ...Furqan, I believe First Time Dying My Hair: Summer before ninth grade First Formal Dance: Homecoming First Time Breaking A Bone: Not applicable, woo First Time Getting Really Sick: When I was less than a year old. That is also the last time I've ever been really sick L A S T Last Cuss Word Uttered: Shit Last Compliment: Uhh... is "way to go" a compliment? Because I said that to <insert person here> about succeeding at anal masturbation. Last/Current boy/girlfriend: Kait. I have no current boy/girlfriend. I believe I asked you to go away. Last Crush: Keith Last Time Driving: A few days ago Last Big Car Ride: Going to/from Atlanta to pick up Lucy Last movie: March of the PEnguins Last Phone Call: Mom Last Thing Written: ...idunno Last Show Watched: Ew, TV Last Time Showered: ...I refuse to answer this question Last Shoes Worn: Vans Last Person That You Saw Naked Besides You: Lucy, I imagine. When I was about five. I have, however, since seen several people with nothing covering areas that should be covered. Last CD Played: A mix Lucy made Last Item Bought: Ice cream sandwich. The one thing I'll miss about the zoo: The availability of yummy food. Last Disappointment: That I scratched my ear, but failed to make it stop itching Last Annoyance: My computer Last Song You Heard: "Narcoleptic" by Placebo I AM: Drained I WANT: To go to sleep I HAVE: A headache I WISH: That age differences didn't matter I MISS: Keith I FEAR: Being hurt. How boring. I HEAR: Placebo, Lucy practicing the drums, Dad making fun of Lucy practicing the drums I SEARCH FOR: A razor would be lovely... I WONDER: Why people are all dumbasses I REGRET: Not going to aikido Wednesday, even though I'd probably have ended up throwing up/half-conscious I LOVE: Sleep. Sleep is good. I ACHE: In the head I ALWAYS: ...uh. Eat? I AM NOT: A dude I DANCE: When absolutely no one is watching. No one. I SING: Moderately well, I think... I CRY: Blood. (Sorry, Ivy, I stole your answer.) I AM NOT ALWAYS: Asleep, much to my sorrow I WRITE: Poetry, mostly I WIN: Not much of anything I LOSE: Most of my possessions I CONFUSE: Biology I SHOULD: Die SIGN: Taurus NATURAL HAIR COLOR: Brown CURRENT HAIR COLOR: Black, with very obvious brown roots EYE COLOR: Dark brown (FAVORITES) NUMBER: 4 COLOR: Black, red, silver DAY: Wednesday MONTH: October SONG: "Remember" by Disturbed FOOD: Pizza/pasta SEASON: Winter DRINK: Sunkist (PREFERENCES) CUDDLE OR MAKE OUT? Cuddling, I thin k CHOCOLATE MILK, OR HOT CHOCOLATE? Hot chocolate, duh MILK, DARK, OR WHITE CHOCOLATE? Ew, none. VANILLA OR CHOCOLATE? Vanilla (IN THE LAST 24 HOURS, HAVE YOU....) CRIED? Yes HELPED SOMEONE? Not that I know of BOUGHT SOMETHING? No GONE TO THE MOVIES? No GONE OUT FOR DINNER? No SAID "I LOVE YOU"? No WRITTEN A REAL LETTER? No TALKED TO AN EX? No MISSED AN EX? Duh WRITTEN IN A JOURNAL? Yes (LJ) HAD A SERIOUS TALK? Yes MISSED SOMEONE? Yes HUGGED SOMEONE? Yes KISSED SOMEONE? No FOUGHT WITH YOUR PARENTS? No FOUGHT WITH A FRIEND? No Katie, look what you did. DIRECTIONS: Name 10 People/Places/Things/etc. you find overrated and then tag five people. 1. Volunteering at the zoo 2. Christianity 3. The Mellow Mushroom 4. JKR 5. Spaghetti sauce 6. The student center 7. Mrs. Whiteside 8. Tan skin 9. Rennaisance art 10. The Killers Tagging Eric, Emily, Ivy... uh... Christina, and... ... ... ...Lucy.
Who is your harry potter husband? (girls and gay guys.) by maureeni
Your name is:
Your husband is:Draco Malfoy
Your pet will be:A dog
You met him:Through your friends
You fell in love:When you gave him a love potion
Your marriage will end:Your abusive so he leaves you (and takes the kids)
You have __ kids:7
Random fact about your relationship:your husbands mom hates you
Quiz created with MemeGen!
Woo, Draco. And Narcissa hates everyone.

So, uh, yeah. Yesterday was zoo, so I came home, slept, woke up to eat, and went to sleep again. -_- Today I didn't think I'd get the computer because my dad was paying taxes on it all day, and I was all sad and non-LJ-y. But now I am all happy and LJ-y. Before I proceed, I would like to angst abotu Keith. ::angsts about Keith:: And now for the real news. HOLY SHIT, IVY, I LOVE YOU. Guess who got Gravi today. :D :D :D ::TACKLEGLOMP:: By the way, Ivy, I had a dream last night. I think you were in it. And you were emaciated-looking. That's all I remember. Also notable: I had an interesting inbox today. Email 1 I just wanted to share that I've just orgasmed (in less than five minutes) through anal masturbation. ... ... ... I just felt like experimenting... I used to think it couldn't possibly feel good at all, and that it would most certainly be painful...but, well. There you go. It wasn't painful in the least bit. o.o ...::cackle:: I just stared at that one for a while. And then laughed so hard I almost cried. Email 2 > After every flight, Quantas pilots fill out a form, called a "gripe sheet," > which tells mechanics about problems with the aircraft. The mechanics > correct the problems, document their repairs on the form, and then pilots > review the gripe sheets before the next flight. > > Never let it be said that ground crews lack a sense of humor. > > Here are some actual maintenance complaints submitted by Qantas' pilots > (marked with a P) and the solutions recorded (marked with an S) by > maintenance engineers. > > > > By the way, Qantas is the only major airline that has never had an accident. > > > > P: Left inside main tire almost needs replacement. > > S: Almost replaced left inside main tire. > > +++ > > P: Test flight OK, except auto-land very rough. > > S: Auto-land not installed on this aircraft. > > +++ > > P: Something loose in cockpit. > > S: Something tightened in cockpit. > > +++ > > P: Dead bugs on windshield. > > S: Live bugs on back-order. > > +++ > > P: Autopilot in altitude-hold mode produces a 200 feet per minute descent. > > S: Cannot reproduce problem on ground. > > +++ > > P: Evidence of leak on right main landing gear. > > S: Evidence removed. > > +++ > > P: DME volume unbelievably loud. > > S: DME volume set to more believable level. > > +++ > > P: Friction locks cause throttle levers to stick. > > S: That's what they're for. > > +++ > > P: IFF inoperative. > > S: IFF always inoperative in OFF mode. > > +++ > > P: Suspected crack in windshield. > > S: Suspect you're right. > > +++ > > P: Number 3 engine missing. > > S: Engine found on right wing after brief search. > > +++ > > P: Aircraft handles funny. (I love this one!) > > S: Aircraft warned to straighten up, fly right, and be serious. > > +++ > > P! : Target radar hums. > > S: Reprogrammed target radar with lyrics. > > +++ > > P: Mouse in cockpit. > > S: Cat installed. > > +++ > > And the best one for last.................. > > > > P: Noise coming from under instrument panel. > > Sounds like a midget pounding on something with a hammer. > > S: Took hammer away from midget ♥ my daddy.

I have a stomach virus.  Waah.  No aikido.

'course.  No zoo either.

But no aikido.  Sad.

1) Aikikai dojos, for example, tend to spend much more time on ki-related training activities than do, for example, Yoshinkan dojos. -Wikipedia on aikido Well, damn. My dojo is Yoshinkan with some Aikikai mixed in. ::blinks:: I wonder where that leaves us. 2) I Googled "gravitation" and found a screenshot from the anime, and now I really want to see it. Damnit. ::facedesk::

Lucy made a cake. I decided to help. The results were questionable. The writing reads, "Shut up. It tastes good. >:(" Courtesy of me. Lucy provided the dots. Me in the kitchen licking the icing bowl. In a very composed and dignified manner, no?
I have a new LJ style, which everyone should go look at now.

I adore Gravitation.

I've only read through book five.  It's upsetting.
Inhaling butter is probably the weirdest experience I've ever had.

I'm hungry.

I think I shall go make myself pasta.

After I find a Disturbed poster and email my parents begging for it.

LOOK WHAT I FOUND AT COCONUTS. Limited-edition version of my favorite band's best CD. ::dies:: And I got it for $20, because it was used. ::hugs it:: It has the CD, which I already had... and the awesomest case/book/thing ever. With the Disturbed emblem in metal on the front. And it's pretty. And it has all the lyrics and these extra thingies and it's yay. And a DVD with behind-the-scenes stuff. Disturbed is my favorite band ever. And Believe is my favorite CD ever. And it has "Remember" on it, and that's my favorite song ever.

-Seregil, m, Nightrunner -Vanyel, m, Last Herald-Mage -Joscelin, m, Kushiel's Legacy -Hyacinthe, m, Kushiel's Legacy -Melisande, f, Kushiel's Legacy (noticing a trend?) -Sirius, m, Harry Potter I feel like I'm missing a lot of people, but these are all that I can think of that are genuinely my all-time favorite characters. (Other favorites are Mogget/Yrael, Lirael, Alec, Nysander, Phedre, Haruka, Eiri, Chi, Frodo, Jermayan, Vestakia, An'desha, and some more people I've forgotten, I'm sure. -_-) Edit: I changed Sirius onto the list of veryveryveryfavorite characters. Because I love Sirius.
Have you ever woken your grandmother up at three in the morning and smashed her in the face with a canoe?

I was looking at the Altamont newsletter, and there was a picture of the library and all of a sudden I kind of missed it. What the hell. Students do not miss school. Students dread school and want to run far away from it. EMILY, THE SECOND HALF OF THE NIGHTRUNNER SERIES IS INCREDIBLY DEPRESSING. I know it has three parts. I'm referring to the second half of the second book as well. It's hard to keep in mind that they aren't real people. Damned talented writers. I WANT SEREGIL TO BE HAPPY. RIGHT NOW. ;_; I DON'T CARE IF HE'S NOT REAL. Rar. I need more icon space. I miss having a paid account.
I'm writing an essay-like thing on my experiences with cutting.  Please read it when it's done, as I will be posting it here and it'd mean a lot to me if you read and left comments.

WE ARE PICKING UP LUCY TODAY AT THE ATLANTA AIRPORT.

::bounce bounce::  Yay.  I want my Lucy back.

<lj-cut text="Hehehehe.">GEORGE W. BUSH
We don't really care why the chicken crossed the road. We just want to know
if the chicken is on our side of the road or not. The chicken is either
against us or for us. There is no middle ground here.

COLIN POWELL
Now to the left of the screen, you can clearly see the satellite image of
the chicken crossing the road.

HANS BLIX
We have reason to believe there is a chicken, but we have not yet been
allowed to have access to the other side of the road.

JOHN KERRY
Although I voted to let the chicken cross the road I am now against it!

RALPH NADER
The chicken's habitat on the other side of the road had been polluted by
unchecked industrial greed. The chicken did not reach the unspoiled habitat
on the other side of the road because it was crushed by the wheels of a 
gas-guzzling SUV.

PAT BUCHANAN
To steal the job of a decent, hard-working American.

RUSH LIMBAUGH
I don't know why the chicken crossed the road, but I'll bet it was getting a
government grant to cross the road, and I'll bet that somebody out there is
already forming a support group to help chickens with crossing-the-road
syndrome. Can you believe this? How much more of this can real Americans
take? Chickens crossing the road paid for by their tax dollars. And when I
say tax dollars, I'm talking about your money, money the government took
from you to build a road for chickens to cross.

MARTHA STEWART
No one called me to warn me which way that chicken was going. I had a
standing order at the Farmer's Market to sell my eggs when the price 
dropped
to a certain level. No little bird gave me any insider information.

JERRY FALWELL
Because the chicken was gay --- isn't it obvious? Can't you people see the
plain truth in front of your face? The chicken was going to the 'other
side'. That's what they call it the other side. Yes, my friends, that
chicken is gay. And if you eat that! chicken, you will become gay too. I 
say
we Boycott (notice I didn't say Girlcott) all chickens until we sort out
this abomination that the liberal media whitewashes with seemingly harmless
phrases like "the other side."

DR SEUSS
Did the chicken cross the road?
Did he cross it with a toad?
Yes, the chicken crossed the road,
But why it crossed I've not been told.

ERNEST HEMINGWAY
To die in the rain. Alone.

MARTIN LUTHER KING, JR
I envision a world where all chickens will be free to cross roads without
having their motives called into question.

GRANDPA
In my day, we didn't ask why the chicken crossed the road. Somebody told us
the chicken crossed the road, and that was good enough.

BARBARA WALTERS
Isn't that interesting? In a few moments, we will be listening to the
chicken tell, for the first time, the heart-warming story of how it
experienced a serious case of molting, and went on to accomplish its life
long dream of crossing the road!

JOHN LENNON
Imagine all the chickens in the world crossing roads together - in peace.

ARISTOTLE
It is the nature of chickens to cross the road.

KARL MARX
It was an historic inevitability.

RONALD REAGAN
What chicken?

CAPTAIN KIRK
To boldly go where no chicken has ever gone before.

SIGMUND FREUD
The fact that you are at all concerned that the chicken crossed the road
reveals your underlying sexual insecurity.

BILL GATES
I have just witnessed eChicken2004 , which will not only cross roads, but
will lay eggs, file your important documents, and balance your checkbook,
and internet explorer is an integral part of eChicken.

ALBERT EINSTEIN
Did the chicken really cross the road, or did the road move beneath the
chicken?

BILL CLINTON
I did not cross the road with THAT chicken. What is your definition of
chicken?

AL GORE
I invented the chicken!

THE BIBLE
And God came down from heaven, and he said unto the chicken THOU SHALT 
CROSS
THE ROAD. And the chicken didst cross the road, and there was much
rejoicing.

COLONEL SANDERS
Did I miss one?</lj-cut>

Rar.

So yeah, I was really pissy at my mom for no reason.

Now I feel kind of bad.

But I'm still in a pissy mood.  No idea why.  ::blink::

Perhaps I'm PMSing.  Although that generally makes me burst into tears, not act snarky.

After writing this, I am all depressed.  Damnit.

Made very long post for community, posted in own LJ by mistake, copied post, went to paste into community, discovered that computer had not copied post.  Have now lost post.

I hate computers.

::cries and throws things around::

I was temporarily sick last night, so I didn't get to dress out for the test. :( Keith is insane. He wanted to uke for everything, and I think he did uke for all the randori. By halfway through the demonstrations he was out of breath and he just kept going. ::bemused smile:: It was kind of cute, though. I LOVE SENSEI JEANETTE. It's like in those corny coming-of-age stories where the person who is coming of age has this awesome mentor and shit. That made no sense. I had really scary dreams last night. o.0 Highlights (lowlights, really): -Flying to Jupiter on a broomstick to rescue Harry Potter characters -Trying to help a city but instead being almost killed because they don't like me... it was scary -Being told (by Dad, of all people) that I would be shot on sight if anyone saw my clothes -All these random people finding this LJ and flaming me and making me a personal enemy for no real reason

<lj-cut text="::gigglefits::">1. I will not poke Hufflepuffs with spoons, nor will I insist that their House colours indicate that they are "covered in bees".
2. No matter how good a fake Australian accent I can do, I will not imitate Steve Irwin during Care of Magical Creatures class.
3. Growing marijuana or hallucinogenic mushrooms is not "an extra credit project for Herbology".
4. "I've heard every possible joke about Oliver Wood's name" is not a challenge.
5. I am not allowed to attempt to breed a liger.
6. I will not go to class skyclad.
7. The Giant Squid is not an appropriate date to the Yule Ball.
8. I will not use Umbridge's quill to write "I told you I was hardcore".
9. I will stop referring to showering as "giving Moaning Myrtle an eyeful".
10. Polishing my wand in the common room is acceptable. "Polishing my wand" in the common room is not.
11. If a classmate falls asleep, I will not take advantage of that fact and draw a Dark Mark on their arm.
12. House elves are not acceptable replacements for Bludgers.
13. Starting a betting pool on the fate of this year's Defense Against the Dark Arts teacher is tasteless and tacky, not a clever money-making concept.
14. I will not start every Potions class by asking Professor Snape if today's project is suitable for use as a sexual lubricant.
15. Adding the name "Bueller" to Professor Binns' roster is not funny.
16. "Springtime for Voldemort" is not an acceptable suggestion for the class play.
17. Seamus Finnegan is not "after me Lucky Charms".
18. I will not refer to the Weasley twins as "bookends".
19. I will not refer to the Patil twins as "bookends".
20. The Slytherin prefect is named Draco Malfoy, not "Rocky Horror."
21. It is exceptionally tasteless to tell Professor Lupin that "Once you go Black, you never go back."
22. I will not call Lucius Malfoy "Jareth".
23. I will not bring a Magic Eight Ball to Divination class.
24. I am not to refer to the Potions classroom as "Kitchen Stadium".
25. I will not tell Ron and Hermione to "Get a room" whenever they start to fight.
26. The Forbidden Forest is forbidden for a reason.
27. I am not a tribble Animagus.
28. I am allowed to have a toad, rat, cat, or owl. I am not allowed to have a reticulated python, snow leopard, Tasmanian devil, or piranha.
29. I do not weigh the same as a duck.
30. Remus Lupin does not want a flea collar.
31. Sirius Black is not #24601.
32. I will not lick Trevor.
33. I will stop asking the Arithmancy teacher what the square root of -1 is.
34. I am not being repressed.
35. Calling Lucius Malfoy "Luscious Mouthful" is just plain gross.
36. I will not change the password to the prefects' bath to "Makes getting clean almost as much fun as getting dirty".
37. There is no such thing as an Invisibility Thong.
38. I am not a Pinball Wizard.
39. Asking "How do you keep a Gryffindor in suspense?" and walking away is only funny the first time.
40. I will not offer to pose nude for Colin Creevey.
41. I will not offer to pose nude for Dean Thomas.
42. It is a bad idea to tell Professor Snape he takes himself too seriously.
43. It is a bad idea to tell Professor McGonagall she takes herself too seriously.
44. Sir Cadogan is not one of the knights who say "NI".
45. I will not offer to prepare tandoori owl.
46. I will stop asking when we will learn to make "Love Potion Number Nine".
47. I will not ask Dumbledore to show me the pointy hat trick.
48. I will not greet Professor McGonagall with "What's new, pussycat?"
49. There is not now, nor has there ever been, a fifth House at Hogwarts, and I am not a member of that house, nor am I its founder.
50. I will not take out a life insurance policy on Harry Potter.</lj-cut>

LORIKEETS! THEY'RE MY BABIES! ♥♥♥ On the train-thinger at the Atlanta airport. Mom caught me unprepared. >.< I knew it was coming this time. The back of my ELDB shirt. ^_^ OH EM GEE ME AND LUCY. At the restaurant, after everyone picked me up from teh camp. Aww, it's Mommy and Daddy. And some weird chick me. That's what happens when you tell my parents to make funny faces, I suppose. -_- HBP party! From left: me, Louis, Lucy, and Rachel. Me. -_- Rachel and her friend Ethan. Rachel! Ain't she cute? OMG IT'S PEEVES. Sirius. HE'S ALIVE! ::rejoice:: I made a WAND. Isn't it pretty? :D (That's Louis holding it, by the way.) SNAPE, THE BASTARD. ::cries:: Plus Rachel, me, and Louis. Lucy is picture-taking, so she couldn not be part of the Snape lovehate. TIM! How random. Moaning Myrtle. ::giggle:: Random hot guy Joseph, because he has a name. Did you expect just one picture of the random hot guy Joseph? Es la Rachel. Yo y Lucy. In line for HBP!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! Except not, 'cause it sucked. OMG I ARE SO PUNK RAWK!!!!111~21` Mom wanted a normal picture. I tried, I really did.

Justin looked like he was trying and failing to be feminine when he was wearing his hakama.

I told him that.  For some reason it offended Katherine.

::bemused look::

Justin didn't seem to mind, so I don't know why it matters.

In other news, Luna/Hermione is my new obsession.

::relieved sigh:: I've never even read any of Lori's work, although I probably should... found the link on the LJ of a friend of Katie's. She has a point about the non-canon aspect, though. ::is a huge fan of D/H, and has always been the first to admit that it is never going to happen:: Woo.

Or after marriage, actually. 32. Do you have a b/f or g/f: NO. GO AWAY. 33. Music/TV: Music 34. Guys/Girls: Depends on the circumstances 35. Green/blue: Blue 36. Pink/Purple: Purple 37. Summer/winter: Winter 38. Night/Day: Night 39. Hangin Out/Chillin: Hangin out 40. Dopey/Funny: Funny 41. Weird saying you have? ...uh, none are coming to mind. But I'm sure they're there. 42. What school do you go to? Altamont 43. Have you ever taken drugs? No, I have not. 44. What's a major turn on for you? Mutual affection... I know it's stupid, go away 45. How far would you go on a first date? I don't know. Kissing? 46. About Friends -A) Most blonde: Katie -B) Craziest person: All of them o.0 -C) Nicest: Em -E) Happiest: Em -F) Strangest: All of them -G) Caring: Uh... -H) Smartest: Katie or Em -I) Best personality: All of them, duh -J) Best all around person: All of them! Stupid stupid question. 48. What do you think of soul mates? I don't believe in them 49. Would u flirt if you have a bf/gf? Apparently, I flirt all the time without meaning to. 50. Last thing you cried over or got teary about? Justin reaching shodan. IN A HAPPY WAY. That was earlier today, heh. 51. What's something about the opposite sex that you don't get? How they can walk without it chafing... 52. Are you happy? Eh 53. Why? Because... eh? 54. What's an object you can't live without? Air conditioning 55. Love or lust: Lust is less painful 56. Silver or gold: Silver 57. Diamond or pearl: Diamond 58. Sunset or sunrise: Sunset 59. Have you ever gone skinny-dipping: Not yet! 60. Do you sleep with stuffed animals: Yep 61. Do you have any piercings? Ears 62. What colour underpants are you wearing right now? White... how boring 63. What song are you listening to rite now? "Remember" by Josh Groban 64. What are the last four digits of your phone number? 9441 65. Where would you want to go on your honeymoon? British Isles 66. Who do you want to spend the rest of your life with? Take a WILD GUESS. >.< 67. Football/soccer: Soccer 68. What makes you happy? Potterpuffs, aikido, sleep, good food 69. Do you wear contacts or glasses? Contacts 70. What's the best advice given to you? "You'll have to do it sooner or later, so be adult about it and do it now." -Keith (paraphrased) 71. Have you ever won any special awards? A few 72. What are your future goals? Reach shodan 73. Worst sickness you ever had? When I was really little I had this random lung problem... at my first Christmas... -_- I don't remember it, but apparently it's the only time I've ever had to be admitted to the hospital 75. Hugs or Kisses? Hugs 76. What song seems to reflect you the most? A lot o.0 "It's You" by Michelle Branch, in particular, at the moment... 77. If you died tomorrow who would you leave EVERYTHING U OWN 2? ::giggle:: "EVERYTHING U OWN 2" OMFG IDK!!!11` Seriously, though... probably my parents, because they paid for most of it anyway 78. Do you have any enemies? Not that I know of o.0 79. What is your greatest fear? Forgetting 80. Would you rather be rich or famous? Rich 81. What time is it in Alabama: ::CACKLE:: THIS QUESTION IS AWESOME. 7:14 PM. ::amused as all hell:: 82. Have you ever been in love? Once 83. Have you met Santa? YES! OMG! HIS BEARD WAS CROOKED AND HE WOULDN'T LET ME PULL ON IT. :( 84. If E.T. knocked on your door holding up a peace sign asking to use your phone what would you do? Let him use it 85.When was the last time u talked about how u REALLY feel with someone u can trust? Uhhh. Idunno. 86. Do you have any pets? Yes! 87.Whats your email address? sangoireroses@yahoo.com 88. Last time you were depressed? Last night? 89. Are you an alcoholic? Ewwwwww, no. 90. Who sent this to you? No one. Stole it from Luce, though 91. What do you think of this person: ::glomps her:: 92. Do you want your friends to write back? Go for it 93. Do you believe in love at first sight? No 94. No. Also, there should not be a question mark after that, as it is not a question. 96. What would you do if a person of the same sex tried to hit on you? Hit on them back, probably 97.
